questions:
Q1: What is the meaning of "Streamline (Verb)"?
A. Stored or managed online instead of locally
B. Driven or supported by artificial intelligence
C. To make a process more efficient

Q2: What are the antonyms of "Cloud-based (Adj)"?
A. Offline, local
B. worsen
C. Pure

Q3: What are the synonyms of "Upgrade (Verb)"?
A. New venture
B. Update, enhance
C. Simplify
Q4: Fill in the blank: "We need to streamline our workflow."
Q5: Fill in the blank: "They use a cloud-based storage system."

Q6: What is the meaning of "AI-powered (Adj)"?
A. Stored or managed online instead of locally
B. Working or operating from a distance
C. Driven or supported by artificial intelligence
Q7: Fill in the blank: "There was a glitch in the system."
Q8: Fill in the blank: "Remote work has become common."

A. perfection
B. On-site, physical
C. Corporation

Q23: What are the synonyms of "Startup (Noun)"?
